system.description:
A golden breastplate and coat that covers almost the entire body, but is surprisingly light. Decorated with intricate gold jewelry patterned into the wings of a garoda.

Effect: When you suffer a melee or ranged attack, you can rush 1 square after the attack.

Garoda Set (1/3): You are considered a Garoda Knight. You have 1 set Garoda Wings, which you can wear for 1 Beat. If you do, gain Garoda Flight x3, wherein you can teleport when you move or are moved.
